newsitem.title: HONG KONG: GE Capital Asia Pac names Ligare managing director.
newsitem.headline: GE Capital Asia Pac names Ligare managing director.

text.p: GE Capital Services on Tuesday said it had appointed Kathleen Ligare as senior vice president and managing director of GE Capital Asia Pacific Ltd.

Relocated to Hong Kong from Brussels, Ligare will take a lead role in managing GE Capital Global Consumer Finance's Asian businesses as well as GE Capital Asia Pacific's sales and market development, the company said in a statement.
Ligare was formerly director of sales and marketing for the company's Avis Fleet Services in Europe.
GE Capital Services is a unit of General Electric Co.
